sent.orig: The EuroPlus + REWARD sets a new standard for computer assisted language learning methods.
sent.trans: REWARD为电脑相关的语言教学设立的全新的标准。

sent.orig: How can I reward your help [reward you for your help]?
sent.trans: 我怎样才能报答你的帮忙呢？

sent.orig: Reward your successes. As soon as you achieve something reward yourself.
sent.trans: 学会奖赏自己，一旦获得成功就要犒赏一下自己。

sent.orig: Reward and State Technical Advance Reward have acquired 840patents in total.
sent.trans: 家科技进步奖获奖项目取得发明专利数量共计840项。

sent.orig: REWARD As a reward for his bravery, the soldier was a gold medal.
sent.trans: 为报答他的勇敢，这个士兵被授于一面金匾。
